thread.title: The ’90s goth teen in us is morbidly excited for MAC’s upcoming black matte lipstick
thread.title_full: The ’90s goth teen in us is morbidly excited for MAC’s upcoming black matte lipstick

author: Jascmeen
title: The ’90s goth teen in us is morbidly excited for MAC’s upcoming black matte lipstick
text:
The ’90s goth teen in us is morbidly excited for MAC’s upcoming black matte lipstick Those of us who love a little goth glam know how difficult it is to find just the right black lipstick . Some aren’t opaque enough, others are more of a deep purple than a real black , and some can even fade into a weird murky brown.
MAC is releasing a true black liquid lipstick and the ’90s goth teen ins us can’t wait to get our hands on it.
True MAC junkies know this release is long overdue. As part of MAC’s Liptensity collection , they released a black shade, Stallion. It had a pretty good pigment but still could have been richer and more opaque. MAC’s Black Knight lipstick is a creme sheen and even with multiple layers just doesn’t give a gothy, jet black mouth.
MAC’s Caviar liquid lipstick looks like the intense blacker than black we’ve been waiting for.
#BLACK #LiquidLipstick by @maccosmetics #Caviar - pure black #Matte ! #ComingSoon *we will keep u updated What are your thoughts? No official launch date has been announced but we’re pretty sure that Caviar will retail for $21 like the rest of the MAC’s Retro Matte Liquid Lipcolors .
How cool is it that we’re getting a new matte black just in time for… SPRING! Bye-bye peachy nudes.
